Posts.Content: Hello ladies what a revelation ! I thought I was the only one growing golden fur and have been quietly stressing about it. I finished treatment for a type of throat cancer 5 months ago and thought that maybe the treatment I had to the head and neck area had caused these hairy changes. Thankyou for enlightening me take care and best wishes Jacqui x
Posts.Title: I'm growing a hairy,furry face!!!
